DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 18 older . 2 . Subject willing able provide write consent . 1 . Subject severe contact allergy may cause reaction standard adhesive material find pulse oximetry sensor , ECG electrodes , respiration monitor electrodes medical sensor . 2 . ( Three event irregularities radial pulse within thirty second ) . 4 . Women pregnant lactating .
